Package seng201.team15.models

Class CurrentRound

java.lang.Object
seng201.team15.models.CurrentRound
public class CurrentRound extends Object
Class used to store and retrieve the current round number

    • setDifficulty

      public void setDifficulty(String input)
      Based on the users decided difficulty, which is passed through as a String input, changes how far the carts will travel and how many carts there will be for that difficulty
      Parameters:
      input - the difficulty the user decides on

    • setCarts

      public void setCarts()
      When called, generates a number of carts which increase with difficulty as the user completes more rounds, and with i - the higher the value of i, the tougher the cart is. The carts are retrieved based on difficulty, harder difficulty will retrieve carts from the lists at higher indexes, leading to tougher carts. Rarer resource types are available further throughout the game proportionate to the total number of rounds the user chooses. Also sets the number of hard carts, so it doesn't change every time the difficulty is changed from the dropdown on the main page

    • setGameSuccess

      public void setGameSuccess()
      Sets the game success value to true, indicating that the game has been completed successfully

    • setTotalRounds

      public void setTotalRounds(int input)
      Sets the total rounds value to be the chosen number of rounds
      Parameters:
      input - the value of how many round the user wants to play

    • storeCarts

      public void storeCarts(ArrayList<Cart> input)
      Locks in the current selection of carts, based on the difficulty the user has chosen
      Parameters:
      input - the current choice of carts to be locked in.
